com.facebook.litho

Class ComponentViewTestHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.ComponentViewTestHelper

  • public class ComponentViewTestHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to access metadata from ComponentView that is relevant during end to end tests. In order for the data to be collected, ComponentsConfiguration.isEndToEndTestRun must be enabled.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ComponentViewTestHelper()

      Finds a TestItem given a ComponentView based on the test key it was assigned during construction.

    • Method Detail

      • findTestItem

        @Nullable
public static TestItem findTestItem(ComponentView componentView,
                                              java.lang.String testKey)
        Parameters:
        componentView - The component view the component is mounted to.
        testKey - The unique identifier the component was constructed with.
        Returns:
        Test item if found, null otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the e2e flag is not enabled in the configuration.
        See Also:
        Note: If there is more than one element mounted under the given key, the last one to render will be returned.

      • findTestItems

        @NonNull
public static java.util.Deque<TestItem> findTestItems(ComponentView componentView,
                                                               java.lang.String testKey)
        Finds a TestItem given a ComponentView based on the test key it was assigned during construction. Example use: 
        {@code
  final ComponentView componentView = ComponentTestHelper.mountComponent(
      mContext,
      new InlineLayoutSpec() {
        Parameters:
        componentView - The component view the component is mounted to.
        testKey - The unique identifier the component was constructed with.
        Returns:
        Queue of mounted items in order by mount time.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the e2e flag is not enabled in the configuration.
